Utilities

Date time input

A date time picker. Alternatively, use the date time range picker to select a range of dates. The value of the date range picker is always two dates.

Arguments

id

A character specifying the id of the datetime input.

choices

Date objects or character strings specifying the set of dates the user may choose from, defaults to NULL in which case the user may choose any date.

selected

Date objects or character strings specifying the dates selected by default in the date input, defaults NULL in which case no dates are selected by default.

min,max

Date objects or character strings in the format YYYY-mm-dd specifying the minimum and maximum date that can be selecetd, both default to NULL in which case there is no minimum or maximum value respectively.

multiple

One of TRUE or FALSE specifying whether multiple dates may be selected, if TRUE the user may select multiple dates and a vector of one or more dates is returned as the reactive value.

...

Additional named arguments passed as HTML attributes to the parent element.
